UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Optimization of oncocin for antibacterial activity using a SPOT synthesis approach: extending the pathogen spectrum to Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Knappe D, Ruden S, Langanke S, Tikkoo T, Ritzer J, Mikut R, Martin LL, Hoffmann R, Hilpert K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µg/ml)
